note:
This account is about gun violence in the United States. #BanGuns

Gun violence in the US is out of hand. Let's do something about it! I'm not sure what the right next move is, but the first move is to start organizing and talking about what to do.

If you do not want to see US political content or news and activism related to gun control in the US, please mute or block this account, no hard feelings.

Please also don't loose sight of the ongoing attack on the LGBTQ+ community
